typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256,uint256,uint256[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint256[] memory,uint256,uint256,enum ISTO.FundRaiseType[] memory,address payable,address,contract IERC20[] memory) external

nodes.documentation:
@notice This function returns the signature of configure function
@return bytes4 Configure function signature
nodes.name: getInitFunction

params._beneficiary: Address where security tokens will be sent
params._minTokens: Minumum number of tokens to buy or else revert

params._beneficiary: Address where security tokens will be sent
params._minTokens: Minumum number of tokens to buy or else revert

params._beneficiary: Address where security tokens will be sent
params._minTokens: Minumum number of tokens to buy or else revert
params._usdToken: Address of USD stable coin to buy tokens with

capReached().return: bool Whether the cap was reached

params._allowBeneficialInvestments: Boolean to allow or disallow beneficial investments

params._investors: Array of investor addresses to modify
params._nonAccreditedLimit: Array of uints specifying non-accredited limits

params._endTime: Unix timestamp at which offering get ended
params._fundRaiseTypes: Types of currency used to collect the funds
params._nonAccreditedLimitUSD: Limit in USD (* 10**18) for non-accredited investors
params._startTime: Unix timestamp at which offering get started
params._treasuryWallet: Ethereum account address to receive unsold tokens
params._usdTokens: Contract address of the stable coins
params._wallet: Ethereum account address to hold the funds

convertFromUSD(uint8,uint256).return: uint256 Value in ETH or POLY

getAccreditedData().return: investors list of all configured investorsaccredited whether investor is accreditedoverride any USD overrides for non-accredited limits for the investor

getRate(uint8).details: returns current conversion rate of funds

params._fundRaiseType: Fund raise type to get rate of

getSTODetails().return: Unixtimestamp at which offering gets start.Unixtimestamp at which offering ends.Currently active tierArray of Number of tokens this STO will be allowed to sell at different tiers.Array Rate at which tokens are sold at different tiersAmount of funds raisedNumber of individual investors this STO have.Amount of tokens sold.Array of bools to show if funding is allowed in ETH, POLY, SC respectively

getTokensMinted().return: uint256 Total number of tokens minted

getTokensMintedByTier(uint256).return: uint256[] array of minted tokens in each fund raise type

getTokensSold().return: uint256 Total number of tokens sold

getTokensSoldByTier(uint256).return: uint256 Total number of tokens sold in the tier

getTokensSoldFor(uint8).return: uint256 Total number of tokens sold for ETH

isOpen().return: bool Whether the STO is accepting investments

modifyAddresses(address,address,address[.details: Modifies addresses used as wallet, reserve wallet and usd token

params._treasuryWallet: Address of wallet where unsold tokens are sent
params._wallet: Address of wallet where funds are sent

params._fundRaiseTypes: Array of fund raise types to allow

modifyLimits(uint256,uint256).details: modifies max non accredited invets limit and overall minimum investment limit

modifyOracle(uint8,address).details: Modifies Oracle address.     By default, Polymath oracles are used but issuer can overide them using this function     Set _oracleAddress to 0x0 to fallback to using Polymath oracles

modifyTiers(uint256[],uint256[],uint256[.details: modifiers STO tiers. All tiers must be passed, can not edit specific tiers.

params._ratePerTierDiscountPoly: Array of discounted poly rates per tier
params._tokensPerTierDiscountPoly: Array of discounted tokens per tier
params._tokensPerTierTotal: Array of total tokens per tier

modifyTimes(uint256,uint256).details: Modifies STO start and end times

pause().details: Only securityToken owner restriction applied on the super function

reclaimERC20(address).details: We duplicate here due to the overriden owner & onlyOwner

params._tokenContract: The address of the token contract

reclaimETH().details: We duplicate here due to the overriden owner & onlyOwner

devdoc.title: STO module for standard capped crowdsale

capReached().notice: Checks whether the cap has been reached.

changeAllowBeneficialInvestments(bool).notice: Function to set allowBeneficialInvestments (allow beneficiary to be different to funder)

changeNonAccreditedLimit(address[],uint2.notice: Modifies the list of overrides for non-accredited limits in USD

configure(uint256,uint256,uint256[],uint.notice: Function used to intialize the contract variables

convertFromUSD(uint8,uint256).notice: This function converts from USD to ETH or POLY

convertToUSD(uint8,uint256).notice: This function converts from ETH or POLY to USD

finalize().notice: Finalizes the STO and mint remaining tokens to treasury addressTreasury wallet address must be whitelisted to successfully finalize

getAccreditedData().notice: Returns investor accredited & non-accredited override informatiomn

getDataStore().notice: used to return the data store address of securityToken

getInitFunction().notice: This function returns the signature of configure function

getNumberOfTiers().notice: Return the total no. of tiers

getPermissions().notice: Return the permissions flag that are associated with STO

getRaised(uint8).notice: Returns funds raised by the STO

getTokensMinted().notice: Return the total no. of tokens minted

getTokensMintedByTier(uint256).notice: Return array of minted tokens in each fund raise type for given tier param _tier The tier to return minted tokens for

getTokensSold().notice: Return the total no. of tokens sold

getTokensSoldByTier(uint256).notice: Return the total no. of tokens sold in a given tier param _tier The tier to calculate sold tokens for

getTokensSoldFor(uint8).notice: Return the total no. of tokens sold for the given fund raise type param _fundRaiseType The fund raising currency (e.g. ETH, POLY, SC) to calculate sold tokens for

getUsdTokens().notice: Return the usd tokens accepted by the STO

isOpen().notice: This function returns whether or not the STO is in fundraising mode (open)
